parsed.title: Quando um mito medieval alimenta um massacre moderno
parsed.summary: Um bispo do século XV assinou um documento que transformou a morte de um menino em um símbolo de sangue sagrado, permitindo a expropriação das riquezas da comunidade judaica e alimentando um culto de ódio que durou séculos. Quatrocentos e cinquenta anos depois, um jovem extremista americano encontrou naquele mesmo mito a justificativa para um tiroteio em uma sinagoga, mostrando como a manipulação de um evento histórico pode ser reaproveitada por novas tecnologias para incitar violência. O mecani... [truncated 160 chars]

scenes.narration: Um bispo assinou. O sangue de um menino virou moeda.
scenes.visualDescription: Cinematic 2D illustration, Studio Ghibli art style dark variant, painterly anime aesthetic, moody and atmospheric, dimly lit bishop study with a heavy wooden desk, parchment bearing a crimson seal, quill and candle flame, low angle wide shot, chiaroscuro lighting with candlelight cutting through deep shadows, dust motes swirling in the faint light.
scenes.motionDescription: Candle flame flickers gently, dust particles drift slowly across the desk, parchment slightly rustles as if a breeze passes.
scenes.audioDescription: soft candle crackle, distant echo of church bells

scenes.narration: Ele confiscou as casas e dívidas dos judeus, enchendo o cofre da catedral.
scenes.visualDescription: Cinematic 2D illustration, Studio Ghibli art style dark variant, painterly anime aesthetic, moody and atmospheric, same bishop study, open wooden chest overflowing with gold coins and ledgers, heavy iron lock glints, low angle close-up of coins spilling, warm candlelight highlighting the wealth, shadows receding.
scenes.motionDescription: Coins glint as they tumble out, chest lid creaks open slowly, pages of ledgers flutter.
scenes.audioDescription: metallic clink of coins, soft rustle of parchment

scenes.narration: Em 2019, um atirador citou o mito de Trento para justificar o massacre.
scenes.visualDescription: Cinematic 2D illustration, Studio Ghibli art style dark variant, painterly anime aesthetic, moody and atmospheric, modern monitor room with a darkened wall, a computer screen displaying a manifesto screenshot highlighting "Simon de Trento", blue glow illuminating the room, shallow depth of field focusing on the highlighted text, faint neon reflection on the desk.
scenes.motionDescription: Cursor scrolls rapidly, highlighted text flashes briefly, screen flickers with static.
scenes.audioDescription: low hum of computer fans, faint typing sounds

scenes.visualDescription: Cinematic 2D illustration, Studio Ghibli art style dark variant, painterly anime aesthetic, moody and atmospheric, modern monitor room, empty dark screen with faint ambient glow, minimalist composition, shadows dominate the frame.
scenes.motionDescription: Screen remains static, subtle ambient light pulse.
